overview: In January 1985 in California, Tina received two awards at the American Music Awards: one for "best female singer" and the other for "best video actress." A month later, at the Grammy Awards, Tina took the stage three times: as "Best Singer", as "Best Rock Singer" and as Creator of "Best Song."  The disc features one of Tina's best concerts at the peak of her popularity
title: Tina Turner: Private Dancer Tour
